          <title>
            <string language="en">Focusing of objects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fokussierung der Nachrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Centre des objets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Focalizar dos objetos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Focalizzazione degli oggetti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εστίαση των αντικειμένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El enfocarse de objetos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how an eye focuses distant and near objects by making the lens less or more spherical.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cornea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eye</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">retina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spherical lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie ein Auge die entfernte
und nahe Nachrichten, indem es das Objektiv kleiner oder bildet, 
kugelförmiger fokussiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment un oeil 
focalise les objets en faisant à l'objectif moins ou plus sphérique 
éloignés et proches.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como um olho focaliza 
objetos fazendo à lente menos ou mais esférico distante e próximo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come un occhio mette 
a fuoco gli oggetti rendendo all'obiettivo di meno o più sferico 
distanti e vicini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς ένα μάτι στρέφει 
τα απόμακρα και κοντινά αντικείμενα με την κατασκευή του φακού 
λιγότεροι ή πιό σφαιρικός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo un ojo enfoca 
objetos haciendo la lente menos o más esférico distantes y cercanos.</string>
          </description>
